creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seals: Yoshimura 吉村, Muramatsu 村松; publisher's seal: Izumiichi
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: right: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga} | left: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Aoto banashi 青砥調, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 1st month of 1849.
title: Trial Scene from The Story of the Judge Aoto Fujitsuna
